channel.title: Whirlwind Wheelchair
channel.description: A non-profit social enterprise dedicated to improving the lives of people with disabilities in the developing world while also promoting sustainable local economic development

item.title: Spring 2012 News Notes
item.dc:creator: Israel Curtis
item.description: In this issue: Bolivian Disabled Activists Fight for Rights Donate to Help the VA Help Veterans The RoughRider® Comes to the US! Expanding the Whirlwind Team 2010 RoughRider® Features ASME Student Project Download your copy of the 2012 Spring Newsnotes .
item.content:encoded:
In this issue:

  • Bolivian Disabled Activists Fight for Rights
  • Donate to Help the VA Help Veterans
  • The RoughRider® Comes to the US!
  • Expanding the Whirlwind Team
  • 2010 RoughRider® Features
  • ASME Student Project
  • Download your copy of the 2012 Spring Newsnotes  .
